about_the_game:
Welcome to the Demo of your Lil' Airport, the airport simulation game where you supervise your very own flight hub right from your desktop! Get ready to experience the simpler sides of airport management as you build and expand your airfield at your own pace. The Demo allows you to play the current build of the game for 28 in game days.

Build and Customize Your Airport:

From a small airstrip to a bustling travel hub, design and evolve your airport to your heart's content. Construct runways, terminals, facilities, and customize the layout to optimize efficiency and maximize profits - or take it easy and just watch the planes.

Sit Back and Watch Your Airport Grow:

Take a hands-off approach and let your airport grow and evolve, even when you're not actively playing. Earn money from flights, services, and passengers, and reinvest your profits to unlock new upgrades.

Manage Flights

:Keep things running smoothly by managing flight schedules, handling emergencies, and ensuring that passengers reach their destinations on time. With simple controls and straight forward gameplay, managing your airport has never been easier.

Face Challenges:

Navigate through a variety of challenges, such as changing weather conditions, air traffic congestion, and unexpected emergencies. Plan ahead and adapt your strategies to overcome these obstacles and keep your airport running smoothly.

Kick Back and Relax:

Whether you're a seasoned airport manager or a casual gamer looking for a relaxing experience, Lil' Airport offers endless hours of idle fun. Sit back, relax, and enjoy watching your airport thrive and grow.



The Early Access Version includes:
  • Build facilities and terminals to get more flights and passengers
  • Upgrade your runway and air traffic control towers to service even bigger planes
  • Purchase service vehicles and prepare for emergencies
  • Schedule flights and organize their refueling
  • Take care of passengers and their needs
  • Set up utilitities and services to increase your airport rating
